HomeWiki:
Project Description
A DotNetNuke Design Challenge skin package submitted to the "Web Standards" category by dnnskin.net. Eight themes using transparent png, div, CSS, JQuery, XHTML and CSS W3C standards. This skin and container set uses the Core DNN Navigation provider.

The initial release of this HTML skin & container package requires DotNetNuke Core (Community or Pro) version 5.2.0 or greater.

A live demo can be seen @: http://skins.dotnetnuke.com/alphabrisk
Originally submitted by: dnnskin.net
